item.title: Optimizing Model Inference Cold Start
item.author: xieydd@gmail.com (xieydd)
item.description: Previously, while working on Serverless model inference Modelz, although we have pivoted now, I still want to share how to optimize the cold start problem of model inference. Since our service is based on container orchestration, it also involves the cold start problem of containers.
